title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer x = −2

x = −2

1 point is earned for the correct reason

f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = −2 OR f is increasing to the left of x = −2 and decreasing to the right of x = −2. OR

f'(−2) = 0 and f''(−2) < 0

0/2 for point other than −2 or 5

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if maximum and minimum are reversed

f'(−2) = 0 and f''(−2) < 0

0/2 for point other than -2 or 4

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if reverse maximum and minimum

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer x = 4

x = 4

1 point is earned for the correct reason

f′(x) changes from negative to positive at x = 4 OR f is decreasing to the left of x = 4 and increasing to the right of x = 4.

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if reverse maximum and minimum

<-1> for mismatching if clear

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct interval (−1, 1)

1 point is earned for the correct interval (3, 5)

(−1, 1) and (3, 5)

1 point is earned for the correct reason using f′

f′ is increasing on these intervals

Max 1/3 for one incorrect interval

0/3 for two incorrect intervals

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the correct graph

<-1> f(1) ≠ 0

<-1> not decreasing

<-1> incorrect concavity

<-1> f'(1) ≠ 0

Incorrect use of standard notation deduct point only once
